title: Married female teacher lures boy student from Grandma's for SEX . Begs parents not to rat her out!
itunes:title: Married female teacher lures boy student from Grandma's for SEX . Begs parents not to rat her out!
description:
Brittany Zamora lures a 13-year-old student for sex IN and OUT of the classroom, then her lawyers claim she is the victim.

With Nancy Grace today to discuss the case:

-California Prosecutor Wendy Patrick California Prosecutor

- Psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober

- Forensics Experts Joseph Scott Morgan

-Retired Chief Medical Examiner for the State of Georgia, Dr. Kris Sperry

-12 News KPNX Executive Producer Katie Wilcox


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
